hero.title: Hi, I'm Vanessa.
hero.text1: I'm a web developer based in Vancouver, Beautiful British Columbia.
hero.text2: I build full-stack applications and websites that will help you bridge the gap between your business and your customers.
hero.text3: With a background in marketing, I create seamless, user-centered experiences that stay true to your brand—online and in person.
hero.button: Let’s turn your ideas into code!

bandsite.title: Marketing & Promotion
bandsite.description: A fully responsive website for a fictional music band, featuring media-rich content, dynamic events, and an interactive fan engagement section.
bandsite.highlights: Responsive Design, Soundcloud Embedded Player, Concert Schedule, Community Engagement

tumbling-goat.title: E-Commerce Platform
tumbling-goat.description: An e-commerce platform that empowers artists by providing a seamless marketplace to sell their work, while integrating powerful search and recommendation features.
tumbling-goat.highlights: Dynamic Filters, Dropdown Menu, Customers Reviews
tumbling-goat.tech: HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Node.js, React.js, MySQL, Google API, Jira, Canva

instock.title: Inventory Management System
instock.description: An Inventory Management App designed to streamline stock tracking and warehouse operations through intuitive UI and CRUD functionalities.
instock.highlights: Responsive Design, Add Item, Delete Item, Edit Item, Dynamic Inventory
instock.tech: HTML, SCSS, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, React.js, MySQL, Jira, Figma

recovery-rides.title: Website - Volunteer Work
recovery-rides.description: A website for nonprofil organization connecting individuals in various stages of recovery to the outdoors—primarily through mountain biking.

about-me.title: About Me
about-me.tagline: My Mission: Crafting Beautiful, Responsive, and Purposeful Designs
about-me.coding1: I approach web development as both a creative and strategic discipline.
about-me.coding2: I design digital experiences that are visually polished, responsive, and user-centered—paying close attention to detail to ensure each project truly reflects my clients’ vision.

not-coding.title: A picture is worth a thousand words.
not-coding.text: Endurance, perseverance, and the spirit of adventure shape my mindset: goal-oriented, grounded in discipline, and always ready to tackle the next challenge.
